original_text:
Great 88
La danza del leone e quella del drago sono delle danze tradizionali che vengono eseguite durante i festeggiamenti di alcune ricorrenze cinesi, come il Capodanno o la Festa di metà autunno. Great 88 ci fa rivivere la magia di questa festa attraverso una grafica mozzafiato, con simboli in alta definizione e numerose animazioni. Sullo sfondo c’è un palazzo tipico cinese a cui si accede attraverso una lunga scalinata illuminata da tante lanterne. Nella parte sottostante troviamo le impostazioni per settare il gioco, dal valore della moneta al livello della puntata. È possibile anche scegliere la puntata massima o far partire l’Autoplay, inoltre è presente la funzione Gamble per provare a raddoppiare ogni vincita.
La musica orientaleggiante si somma ai suoni meccanici della rotazione dei rulli che però rimangono sullo sfondo. Entrambi possono essere disattivati dalle impostazioni ed è inoltre possibile sceglier la risoluzione grafica tra Bassa, Media o Alta.
Caratteristiche principali di Great 88
La griglia è una classica 5X3, con 30 linee di pagamento fisse. L’RTP è pari al 95,38%, in linea con la maggioranza delle slot. La puntata minima è di 0,01 € per linea di gioco, la massima di 0,10 €, anche se attraverso il tasto Livello Puntata si può incrementare il valore della puntata totale. Attraverso l’Autoplay è possibile impostare un numero di giri compreso tra 1 e 1.000. A seguito di ogni vincita, cliccando il tasto Raddoppia, si potrà decidere se raddoppiare la somma attraverso il classico lancio della moneta scegliendo tra Testa o Croce. Si può anche decidere di tentare un incremento del 50% della vincita.
Simboli e funzionalità
Great 88 è una slot ricca di giochi Bonus che possono far vincere cifre astronomiche! I simboli sono suddivisi in due categorie: simboli base e simboli alti. I simboli base sono quelli che pagano meno, tra questi troviamo le pergamene, gli ideogrammi, i medaglioni con il simbolo 6 e 8. I simboli alti, come la rana, il dragone e il leone posso o arrivare a pagare sino a 5.000 volte la puntata. I fuochi d’artificio rappresentano il simbolo Jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli di base ma non quelli speciali.
I Bonus
Il Bonus di Great 88 è detto “Scatole della Fortuna”. Per attivare questa funzione è necessario che tre scatole appaiono su qualsiasi rullo. Esse possono contenere:

simboli alti

monete di bronzo: il numero di monete determina il valore del moltiplicatore, tra 3 e 15
monete di giada: regala da 3 a 25 giri gratuiti in base al numero di monete trovate

Fuochi d’artificio: trasforma 1 o 2 simboli in Jolly
Involtino d’oro: premia con un giro sulla Ruota Bonus. Facendola ruotare, si possono vincere giri gratis o numerosi moltiplicatori, oltre a un giro sulla Ruota Mega Vincita! Si tratta in questo caso di un’altra ruota che prevede tre diversi premi: Mini, moltiplica per 100 la puntata totale; Grande, in questo caso il moltiplicatore è pari a 750 volte la puntata; Gigante. che m moltiplica per 6.000 volte la puntata totale arrivando quindi a garantire una vincita di oltre 1 milione di crediti!

raw_translation.response:
Experience the magic of traditional Chinese celebrations through the stunning graphics of Great 88. The lion dance and dragon dance are performed during festivities such as Chinese New Year or the Mid-Autumn Festival. The background features a typical Chinese palace, accessed through a long staircase illuminated by lanterns. The game settings, from coin value to bet level, can be adjusted below. You can also choose the maximum bet or start the autoplay, and there's even a gamble function to double your winnings.

Immerse yourself in the oriental music as you spin the reels and enjoy the high-definition symbols and numerous animations. The grid is a classic 5x3, with 30 fixed paylines. The RTP is 95.38%, in line with most slots. The minimum bet is €0.01 per payline, with the maximum set at €0.10. However, you can increase the total bet value through the Bet Level button. Autoplay allows you to set a number of spins between 1 and 1,000. After each win, you can choose to double your money with a classic coin flip or try for a 50% increase.

Great 88 is a bonus-rich slot that can yield astronomical amounts. The symbols are divided into base and high-paying symbols. The base symbols, such as scrolls, ideograms, and medallions with the numbers 6 and 8, pay the least. The high-paying symbols, such as the frog, dragon, and lion, can payout up to 5,000 times your bet. The fireworks symbol is the wild, replacing all base symbols but not the specials.

The Great 88 Bonus is called "Boxes of Fortune." To activate this feature, you need three boxes to appear on any reel. These boxes can contain:

-high paying symbols
-bronze coins: the number of coins determines the multiplier, between 3 and 15
-jade coins: reward from 3 to 25 free spins based on the number of coins found
-fireworks: transforms 1 or 2 symbols into wilds
-golden dumpling: rewards with a spin of the Bonus Wheel. By spinning it, you can win free spins, various multipliers, and even a spin of the Mega Win Wheel. The Mega Win Wheel has three prizes: Mini, which multiplies your total bet by 100; Big, with a multiplier of 750 times your bet; and Giant, which multiplies your total bet by 6,000, potentially yielding more than one million credits!

raw_translation.response:
Great 88 is an immersive slot game that brings us the magic of traditional Chinese festivities with its stunning graphics and high-definition symbols. Set against the backdrop of a typical Chinese palace, the game features an elaborate staircase illuminated by countless lanterns. The settings allow players to adjust the coin value, bet level, and activate the Autoplay or Gamble option for a chance to double their winnings. The oriental music and mechanical sound effects blend seamlessly with the gameplay, creating an unforgettable experience for players. 

The game boasts a typical 5x3 grid with 30 fixed paylines, and an RTP of 95.38%, in line with most slots. The minimum bet per payline is €0.01, while the maximum is €0.10, but players may increase the total bet value using the Bet Level button. Additionally, players can opt for Autoplay mode with up to 1000 spins. After each win, players can choose to double their payout through a classic coin toss (heads or tails) or try their luck with a 50% increase. 

Great 88 also invites players to participate in various bonus games with astronomical payouts. The symbols are divided into two categories: basic symbols (such as scrolls, ideograms, and 6 or 8 medallions) that pay the least, and high-value symbols (such as the frog, dragon, and lion) that can pay up to 5000 times the bet. The fireworks represent the Wild symbol and substitute for all basic symbols but not the special ones. 

The bonus game in Great 88 is called "Boxes of Fortune". Players trigger it by landing three boxes on any reel. The bonus can contain high-value symbols, bronze coins which determine a multiplier (3 to 15), jade coins that grant 3 to 25 free spins according to the number of coins collected, fireworks that transform one or two symbols into Wilds, golden dumplings that award a spin on the Bonus wheel, and finally, the Mega Win wheel that offers three grand prizes: Mini (100x), Grand (750x), and Gigantic (6000x). The latter guarantees over one million credits! 

Overall, Great 88 is an engaging and rewarding slot game that combines stunning graphics, smooth gameplay, and a plethora of bonus features that can lead to grand payouts.

Great 88 is an immersive slot game that brings us the magic of traditional Chinese festivities with its stunning graphics and high-definition symbols. Set against the backdrop of a typical Chinese palace, the game features an elaborate staircase illuminated by countless lanterns. The settings allow players to adjust the coin value, bet level, and activate the Autoplay or Gamble option for a chance to double their winnings. The oriental music and mechanical sound effects blend seamlessly with the gameplay, creating an unforgettable experience for players. 

The game boasts a typical 5x3 grid with 30 fixed paylines, and an RTP of 95.38%, in line with most slots. The minimum bet per payline is €0.01, while the maximum is €0.10, but players may increase the total bet value using the Bet Level button. Additionally, players can opt for Autoplay mode with up to 1000 spins. After each win, players can choose to double their payout through a classic coin toss (heads or tails) or try their luck with a 50% increase. 

Great 88 also invites players to participate in various bonus games with astronomical payouts. The symbols are divided into two categories: basic symbols (such as scrolls, ideograms, and 6 or 8 medallions) that pay the least, and high-value symbols (such as the frog, dragon, and lion) that can pay up to 5000 times the bet. The fireworks represent the Wild symbol and substitute for all basic symbols but not the special ones. 

The bonus game in Great 88 is called "Boxes of Fortune". Players trigger it by landing three boxes on any reel. The bonus can contain high-value symbols, bronze coins which determine a multiplier (3 to 15), jade coins that grant 3 to 25 free spins according to the number of coins collected, fireworks that transform one or two symbols into Wilds, golden dumplings that award a spin on the Bonus wheel, and finally, the Mega Win wheel that offers three grand prizes: Mini (100x), Grand (750x), and Gigantic (6000x). The latter guarantees over one million credits! 

Overall, Great 88 is an engaging and rewarding slot game that combines stunning graphics, smooth gameplay, and a plethora of bonus features that can lead to grand payouts.
